metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000421 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Gifsicle gifview 1.89 and older is vulnerable to a use-after-free in theread_gif function resulting potential code execution

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1000421` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gifsicle - 1.78-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: gifsicle package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.78-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
